con:testCase.name: BadCase-DEV-CAMT054-DEBIT-AssignToMSISDN
con:testCase.con:description:
2017-03-30: Michael.Gordon@cognizant.com Based on requirements in linked impelentation US: DRC-697 folowed testszenarios must be implemented, based on decision in bug: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-883
Prerequisites: Charge back is only possible, if msisdn was registered with contract id before, charged and e2eID saved in DRC data base. In all another constalations charge back will be not proceeded.
From this prerequisites followed test-szenario is derived:
1. Register any msisdn, charge, generate camt054-debit file and deregister. 2. Send camt054-debit file to drc and let proceed it. 3. Make sure, all charge back transactions are in not relatable or error transactions. 4. Assign first transaction to msisdn with ocs-error --> transactions unchanged. 5. Assign second transaction to not exist contractID --> trasactions unchanged. 6. Assig to any not registered telefonica msisdn --> transaction is NOT assigned.

con:request.name: 11040N_assignCamt05400102Transaction-MSISDN-Piranha-Unknown
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:assignCamt05400102Transaction>\r <!--type: long-->\r <camt05400102InputEntyId>${#TestCase#Camt054ID-Debit}</camt05400102InputEntyId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <comment>Test-assignment debit to not telefonica msisdn unknown by piranha</comment>\r <assigningValue>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: string-->\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: string-->\r <msisdn>${#TestCase#MSISDN-Unknown}</msisdn>\r </assigningValue>\r </v1:assignCamt05400102Transaction>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>No PPIT account found for given msisdn/contractId</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:fault xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime" xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/"> <specificFaultType>BUSINESS_ERROR_ACCOUNT_UNKOWN_OR_NOT_REGISTERED</specificFaultType> <errorMessage>No PPIT account found for given msisdn/contractId</errorMessage> <errorCode>1104</errorCode> </ns2:fault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>No PPIT account found for given msisdn/contractId</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:fault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:xmime="http://www.w3.org/2005/05/xmlmime"> <specificFaultType>BUSINESS_ERROR_ACCOUNT_UNKOWN_OR_NOT_REGISTERED</specificFaultType> <errorMessage>No PPIT account found for given msisdn/contractId</errorMessage> <errorCode>1104</errorCode> </ns2:fault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:request.name: 11060N_assignCamt05400102Transaction-ContractID-Unknown
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:assignCamt05400102Transaction>\r <camt05400102InputEntyId>${#TestCase#Camt054ID-Debit}</camt05400102InputEntyId>\r <comment>st-assignment debit to unknown contract id after deregistretion</comment>\r <assigningValue>\r <contractId>${#TestCase#ContractID}</contractId>\r </assigningValue>\r </v1:assignCamt05400102Transaction>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 11080N_assignCamt05400102Transaction-Debit-MSISDN-NotRegistered
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:assignCamt05400102Transaction>\r <!--type: long-->\r <camt05400102InputEntyId>${#TestCase#Camt054ID-Debit}</camt05400102InputEntyId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <comment>Test-assignment debit to exist, but not registered telefonica msisdn must be ok after us-697</comment>\r <assigningValue>\r <msisdn>${#TestCase#MSISDN}</msisdn>\r </assigningValue>\r </v1:assignCamt05400102Transaction>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
